metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Bye Bye Bad Man has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Bye Bye Bad Man has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Mixolydian, D Major,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
